author: Jor_Zin
text:
Everytime I try not to be a bad person, the situation turns me into one and everything goes off beat....
It wearies me alot but.... They would never understand my situation 😔...
Sorry for the rudeness...

author: Jor_Zin
text:
For all the students on my tweeter list: when you are practicing math or any other numerical problems, use 🖊️, pen's ink doesn't last long but you see it does build up your confidence like mine 🤭though I didnt know the answers today😂, I didnt feel so anxious🤗
#pen_is_the_best

author: Jor_Zin
text:
I dunno where I went wrong, but people started comparing themselves to me when I, myself have a long way to go😮‍💨....

And tomorrow onwards my brain will have to work a little more than usual🥵....
#test_vibes😑

author: Jor_Zin
text: And I just went to attic to snap this🤣....Crazy morning 😅 https://t.co/otviFS056v

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Listen to the birds chirping outside your balcony, they got something to tell you... Did you hear them?

I did and they said"Good morning, have a good day😊"
#morning_vibe

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Girl.... You could be irritating too, I didn't know that... Found you simple and sweet but behind that face of your's lies another face hidden...maybe I could be you at times but we are just so different...
I hope you wont disappoint people ✌️

author: Jor_Zin
text:
For all the flaws of mine,
You accepted me the way it is,
I gave you my everything,
But you......
#sad_night_morning_tweet

author: Jor_Zin
text: Global warming has really shaken up everything....spring be like this🥶....#blessing_in_disguise✌️ https://t.co/7nkks0b3kA

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Life is a race, 
        You need to run, but
Don't run alone
#race_is_a_must🤘

author: Jor_Zin
text: Am I rude? Cause I can see people going away from me.....🤧🤧

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Sad feels isnt leaving me... Wanna go somewhere all by myself, leaving behind those worries and sadness to find my happiness once again.
#gloomy_morning

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Mood off......

I dont know why this has to happen at this time.. everything was going fine until the portal closed before its time... Gonna fail for sure😭#_brain_damage

author: Jor_Zin
text:
And at every sharp turns, You need to be careful not to bang on those ends if not.... The journey will be a tough one....😩😩😩
#morning_vibe

author: Jor_Zin
text:
191 followers, 191 following,
Woah!!!!!!!!!!
Equal Equal🙈🙈🙈

author: Jor_Zin
text:
I was wondering how come those Indian tutors on YouTube are so flexible..😅... Their students must be more flexible than them right?
Wished I could have their vibes in me, cause I cant seem to get my things done😥......
#tweet_for_the_day

author: Jor_Zin
text:
In the journey of one's life, we meet different types of people. 
Everyone has a role to play... and that would have positive or negative impact...so be careful with them and act accordingly 😬

author: Jor_Zin
text: I would like to take this time to thank both of you for everything that you have done for students of GHSS.We met with a reason and stayed together until the time came when we had to depart.Memories could be painful but worth remembering.All the students will miss you both,☺️💚 https://t.co/ASCbiMn5T4

author: Jor_Zin
text: Wished there was a possibility😁 https://t.co/dVaiYmBoOV

author: Jor_Zin
text:
I dunno if I were to go with this flow...nothing feels so right at the moment...the deeper I try to go, the heavier the blows I feel on my face... Consistency seems to be shaken 📴... 
Doom at my door🍃
#me_and_myself

author: Jor_Zin
text:
She seems cool and active,
With full energy
Want to know her better,
But she seems to feel it bitter
Her guard stays strong,
Wonder for how long

Wished she could let us in
And not use her shield😂
#tutor_distance

author: Jor_Zin
text:
The journey to a new beginning
Can't wait for that🍃
Hope to encounter all the hurdles on my own if possible 😂

author: Jor_Zin
text:
#second_dose
Everyone is updating their story in messenger..I was thinking, will update here😁
Stay safe🍂 https://t.co/0h7KB7p0K1

author: Jor_Zin
text: For a good reason of Hi, there is always unknown reason of Good Bye🥺~Yongba

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Watch out for your words,
Cause they will mean alot
Though you dont have any
intentions,the person will be hurt🥺
Your words could be bitter like bitter gourd 😅, you see.
That's why :Be mindful of what you want to say cause you need to convey the right message💬

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Relationship can be easy if one tells the other the feelings or uneasiness in him or her...
#motivation_for_love😊 https://t.co/eLhVgCligH

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Use any langauge you can,you can never say anything but what you want~ Ralph Waldo Emerson
But I can't seem to convince other person what do I want
😅😅

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Lockdown,new cases, boredom.. things gonna get even worst than this🥺

Hoping for the table to turn🤕

author: Jor_Zin
text: Sometimes I just feel that I don't belong to where I stand now🤧🤧

author: Jor_Zin
text:
The clear sky after heavy rainfall 😇
Late post😅 https://t.co/Y5DBdUpDU4

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Night's call for me is to sleep.
Kinda exhausted by doing nothing 🤣
So much pressure on this brain but nothing's going on well🤧

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Nothing, literally nothing retains in my small 🧠.
I wonder how am I going to keep everything that is supposed to be with me till the end🤷😭

author: Jor_Zin
text:
I can tell 20 people what to do than to be one of those 20 to follow my own philosophy
🤣😁
~Shakespeare

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Life isn't about pleasing everyone, it is about hurting noone. But why am so concerned about other's when they doesn't value my existence???
#morning_saddness

author: Jor_Zin
text:
But am not one of those intelligent people 🤧

#nights😴 https://t.co/7VZUGXL4wR

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Was hoping for a miracle but see what happened!!
Can't go back to where it was😭
Good day!!🥰

author: Jor_Zin
text:
"People don't forget yuh.
They are just too busy to remember you"~ Unknown
Hope I won't be forgotten too✌️😜

author: Jor_Zin
text:
I just woke up😅
And was thinking how my day will end🤔😂

Good wishes to myself😜

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Your brain is more creative when it's tired🤔🤔- Unknown
But I dont feel any ideas flowing in this brain of mine🤣
#nights✌️

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Time is running out and I have piles of work pending but this brain and heart of mine doesn't cooperate with each other that's why am stuck here😫
#nighttys

author: Jor_Zin
text:
#funny_hour
Never think other person wont know about it. They are smart in their own way. There was a different fun in that☺️
And I just overreacted without knowing 😂

Yes!!! Am relieved..was so stressed 🤧

author: Jor_Zin
text: Every day is a new day but I don't seem to bring changes in my life. For me, every day is the same day except that it got different names🥴

author: Jor_Zin
text:
Too unhappy to be made happy🥺
Guess like I will have to bear this pain for few more days or maybe painkillers could work for it🤞
#sad_life_of_being_girl

author: Jor_Zin
text:
20 years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than the things you did🤔.
So think twice, act wise✌️
#nights👊

author: Jor_Zin
text:
#morning_vibe😴
Still can't get away from my dreams. Maybe I should just wake up to feel the reality😜

author: Jor_Zin
text: Hoping tomorrow to be a better day🤧 https://t.co/MsKLlgNBbt
